title: The molecular control of glial progenitor proliferation in Drosophila and mammals: investigation of Prox1 conditional knock-out mutant mice.
impactText: This was a travel grant to enable the post-doc Kentaro Kato to go to the laboratory of Dr Fumio Matsuzaki at the Riken Centre for Developmental Biology in Japan to carry out experiments in Prox-1 knock-out mice. Healthcare
findingsText: This work is not published yet. We discovered that the gene network that promotes repair after CNS injury has been evolutionarily conserved between flies and mammals. This work has not been published yet, it will become accessible to others after publication in peer reviewed research articles. Healthcare
